tourBios.carHigh:
2015: After 54 holes in first start of the season at the ATB Financial Classic, sat two strokes behind the leader in fifth place. Improved position by three spots Sunday with a 66 to finish solo second, falling to Daniel Miernicki by one stroke.



2014: Made one start, missing the cut at the Cape Breton Open. 



2013: Played all nine events, making two cuts...Owned the first round lead at the SIGA Dakota Dunes Open with a 9-under 63 before finishing T46...Carded weekend rounds of 68-66 to finish a season-best T14 at the Wildfire Invitational.



2012: Made six cuts in eight starts, posting two top-10 finishes in his final three starts...Shot a final round 66 to finish solo fifth in Windsor...Shot four rounds in the 60s to finish T6 at The Great Waterway Classic.



2011: Opened with rounds of 69-66-67 to enter the final round of the Syncrude Boreal Open with a two shot lead...Shot a final round 70 and cruised to a five stroke victory for his first Mackenzie Tour title... Shot a final round 66 to finish solo third at the Dakota Dunes Open...Finished the season ninth on the Order of Merit.



2010: Made six cuts in 10 starts, posting a pair of back-to-back T5 finishes at the Dakota Dunes Open and the Players Cup.



2009: Made two cuts in five starts, with a season-best T18 finish at the ATB Financial Classic.



2008: Made 13 starts in his rookie season on Tour, making four cuts with a season-best T15 finish at the Seaforth Country Classic.
tourBios.personal: Caddies for Canadian Mike Weir on the PGA TOUR... Is a fan of the Edmonton Oilers (NHL)... Began playing golf at eight years old while growing up in Saskatchewan... Lists winning the Syncrude Boreal Open in 2011 as his biggest moment in the game...

dyn.dynBios: Caddies for Mike Weir on the PGA TOUR
dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was 1st in 2011 at the Syncrude Boreal Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T53rd in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
